commits.author: Grant Ingersoll
commits.sourceNew: /** * Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none is found, * reads the terms in field as doubles and returns an array of * size reader.maxDoc() of the value each document has in the * given field. * * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the doubles. * @param parser Computes integer for string values. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public double[] getDoubles(IndexReader reader, String field, DoubleParser parser) throws IOException;

commits.author: Uwe Schindler
